title: Rittal showcases innovation and expertise at PACK EXPO Las Vegas 2015
text:
This article was posted on 09/24/2015 Rittal showcases innovation and expertise at PACK EXPO Las Vegas 2015 Attendance will also feature two sister companies, EPLAN Software & Services and Kieslin Rittal Corporation, the world’s largest manufacturer of electrical enclosure cabinets and accessories for power distribution, climate control and IT infrastructure for industries from food and beverage and oil and gas to IT/data centers, will showcase its food and beverage offerings at PACK EXPO Las Vegas, one of the food and beverage industry’s largest events. Rittal’s attendance at this year’s PACK EXPO will also feature two sister companies, EPLAN Software & Services and Kiesling. Rittal offers a variety of solutions designed for the critical food and beverage market. Rittal’s HD Hygienic Design terminal boxes and enclosures are widely used in food manufacturing and food safety applications, as they bring customers a variety of advantages particularly critical to food production:• Sloped top enclosures that ensure particles and dust don’t settle on the enclosure• Modular enclosure designs that maximize available space for mounting equipment inside the enclosure• Removable gaskets that can be cleaned and replaced to prevent bacteria from gathering • Hinges, seals and enclosure designs that simplify cleaning and washdown operations for food manufacturersAttendees to PACK EXPO Las Vegas can find Rittal located in booth # S-7337 in the Processing Zone on the show floor, where they can view Rittal’s newest solutions for food/beverage packaging and processing plants, gain hands-on experience with the quality and design of Rittal products, and meet with its expert team to answer questions on how Rittal products are best-engineered to meet strict food safety guidelines. 
Rittal will also offer two presentations to show attendees: IIOT offers Automated Solutions for Food and Beverage Manufacturers, presented twice by Rittal Systems Consultant Ben Halladay at the Food Safety Summit Resource Center; and The Ease of Building a Rittal TS8 Modular Enclosure, a twice-daily in-booth demo at 11 a.m. and 2 p.m. on Rittal’s best-selling flagship product the TS 8 freestanding enclosure. To schedule a visit at the Rittal booth, head here . Information on Rittal’s attendance and presentations at this year’s Pack Expo Las Vegas can be found at https://rittalenclosures.com/pack-expo-2015/ .
